derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek epiphusis, from epi 'upon, in addition' + phusis 'growth'

means.word_mean: 1. the end of a long bone; initially separated from the main bone by a layer of cartilage that eventually ossifies so the parts become fused
2. a small endocrine gland in the brain; situated beneath the back part of the corpus callosum; secretes melatonin
